
snap(10,40,-20)


sky(100,127,155)
fog(115,145,120) 
ground(95,110,117)

fadefrom(7000)

name(Emerald Obliquity)

nlaps(3)

set(10,0,0,0)p
set(10,0,5600,0)
set(30,0,4500,180)
set(10,0,11200,0)p
set(14,0,15200,-90)p
chk(40,-1500,15200,90)
set(10,-4000,15200,90)p
set(13,-9645,13680,120)
chk(40,-12487,12160,90)
set(12,-15330,13680,60)
chk(40,-18172,15200,90)
set(13,-21015,13680,120)
set(14,-25610,12160,0)pt
set(10,-25610,8000,0)p
chk(40,-25610,8000,0)
set(28,-25610,8000,0)pr
set(14,-25610,4000,90)pt
set(12,-21015,2480,60)
chk(40,-18000,960,90)
set(14,-16420,960,180)pt
set(12,-14900,5555,-30)
set(14,-13380,10150,0)pt
chk(40,-12000,10150,90)
set(12,-8785,8630,60)
set(14,-4190,7110,-90)pt
chk(40,-4190,6000,0)
set(10,-4190,3000,0)p
set(36,-6000,1500,90)
set(36,-6000,-1500,90)
set(10,-4190,-2600,0)p
set(14,-4190,-6600,180)pt
chk(40,-5400,-6600,90)
set(31,-9100,-6600,90)pr

set(23,-17000,-6600,90)
set(10,-19000,-6600,90)p
set(14,-23000,-6600,90)pt
chk(40,-23000,-5000,0)
set(14,-23000,-3400,0)pt
set(13,-18405,-1880,120)
chk(40,-15000,-360,90)
set(14,-13810,-360,180)pt
set(14,-13810,3000,0)pt
chk(40,-12105,3000,90)
set(14,-10400,3000,-90)pt
set(22,-10400,1000,0)
set(12,-11920,-2355,-30)
chk(40,-13440,-5197,0)
set(13,-11920,-8040,30)p
set(14,-10400,-12635,90)pt
chk(40,-9000,-12635,90)
set(10,-6400,-12635,90)p
set(10,-4000,-12635,90)p
chk(40,-1500,-12635,90)
set(14,0,-12635,180)pt
set(10,0,-8635,0)p
set(26,0,-4500,0)pr
set(10,0,-5600,0)
fix(41,0,0,-1800,0)s




maxr(20,3000,-15000)
maxb(7,-15600,-27200)
maxt(7,16600,-27200)
maxl(20,-28600,-15000)
